resources.string: To open songs list click Maher Zain Songs card if you want to open photos activity click photos list button or to About activity click About Maher Zain Button
This Activity display some photos for the artist Maher Zain if you want to back to songs list click songs list button or to About activity click About Maher Zain Button

This activity display list of Maher Zain\'s songs when we click on any song the media player switch on as we click on play button and if we click pause button the media player pause use stop to stop the media player
This activity display information about Maher Zain if you want to back to songs list click songs list button or to photos activity click photos list
Maher Zain \n(born 16 July 1981) is a Swedish R and B singer, songwriter and music producer of Lebanese origin.

\n He released his debut album Thank You Allah, an internationally successful album produced by Awakening Records, in 2009.He released his follow-up album Forgive Me in April 2012 under the same production company.
\nFor Extra Information visit this link : https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Maher_Zain
